snippet: German Chancellor Angela Merkel on Monday said there was "absolutely no justification" for Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan's comments comparing German bans on certain political rallies to "fascist actions" remniscent of the Nazi times....

headline.main: Merkel Says No Justification for Erdogan's Nazi Comparisons
headline.print_headline: Merkel Says No Justification for Erdogan's Nazi Comparisons

lead_paragraph: German Chancellor Angela Merkel on Monday said there was "absolutely no justification" for Turkish President Tayyip Erdogan's comments comparing German bans on certain political rallies to "fascist actions" remniscent of the Nazi times.
